00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeSize3DB4.hpp"
00035 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"

00037 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00038 
00039 std::string TShapeSize3DB4::get_name() const
00040   { return "TShapeSize3DB4"; }
00041 
00042 TShapeSize3DB4::~TShapeSize3DB4() {}
00043 
00044 bool TShapeSize3DB4::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00045                                double& result, 
00046                                MsqError&  )
00047 {
00048   const double tau = det(T);
00049   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00050     result = 0.0;
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00055   result = norm*norm*norm / (3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*tau) - 1 
00056          + mGamma * (tau + 1/tau - 2);
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TShapeSize3DB4::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00061                                          double& result,
00062                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv,
00063                                          MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   const double tau = det(T);
00066   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00067     result = 0.0;
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070   
00071   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00072   const double f = norm*norm/3.0;
00073   const double g = norm / (MSQ_SQRT_THREE * tau);
00074   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00075   result = f * g - 1 + mGamma * (tau + inv_tau - 2);
00076   
00077   deriv = g*T;
00078   deriv += (mGamma * (1 - inv_tau*inv_tau) - f*g*inv_tau) * transpose_adj(T);
00079   
00080   return true;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 bool TShapeSize3DB4::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00085                                          double& result,
00086                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv,
00087                                          MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00088                                          MsqError& err )
00089 {
00090   const double tau = det(T);
00091   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00092     result = 0.0;
00093     return false;
00094   }
00095   
00096   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00097   const double f = norm*norm/3.0;
00098   const double h = 1/(MSQ_SQRT_THREE * tau);
00099   const double g = norm * h;
00100   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00101   result = f * g - 1 + mGamma * (tau + inv_tau - 2);
00102   
00103   const double g1 = mGamma * (1 - inv_tau*inv_tau);
00104   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00105   deriv = g*T;
00106   deriv += (g1 - f*g*inv_tau) * adjt;
00107   
00108   const double inv_norm = 1/norm;
00109   set_scaled_outer_product( second, h*inv_norm, T );
00110   pluseq_scaled_I( second, norm * h );
00111   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, g1 - f*g*inv_tau, T );
00112   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, (f*g + mGamma*inv_tau)*2*inv_tau*inv_tau, adjt );
00113   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -g*inv_tau, T, adjt );
00114   
00115   return true;
00116 }
